data.name: Roll Out
data.tooltip: After not attacking for <d ref="duckiesHeroKriWeapon_RollOutCDBuff.duration"/> seconds, this unit will tuck into a ball, gaining <d ref="duckiesHeroKri_RollOutPassiveBuff.modifiers[0].amount" style="Bold"/><Bold>%</> bonus movement speed and ability to push through units. The first attack in Ball Form will deal damage to all surrounding ground enemies.
